summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of offline-first artisan market sales tracking app completed. Core functionality working well with excellent UI/UX design. Minor data persistence issue identified.

integration_issues.issue: Products occasionally disappear when navigating between pages, requiring re-addition
integration_issues.details: IndexedDB stores are properly configured but data doesn't always persist across page navigations in some browser sessions

passed_tests: Navigation between all 3 main pages (Vendita, Storico, Impostazioni)
Product management - Add products with name, price, cost
Product management - Delete products with confirmation
Sales page - Product counter increment/decrement functionality
Sales page - Market cost input and calculations
Sales page - Total revenue and profit calculations
Sales page - Sale completion with FATTO button
Sales page - Cart reset after sale completion
History page - Filter buttons (All, Year 2026, Custom)
History page - Totals display (Revenue, Cost, Profit)
History page - PDF export button functionality
IndexedDB setup - 3 stores confirmed (products, sales, settings)
Design compliance - Neo-Brutalist style with thick borders
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate and fix IndexedDB data persistence issue where products occasionally disappear during page navigation. Consider adding better error handling and data recovery mechanisms for offline storage.
